title: Self-Regulated Learning (SRL)-Based Mobile Mathematics Teaching Competency Enhancement Course for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: In-service elementary teachers access smartphone-based microlearning to enhance self-directed learning competencies and improve math teaching efficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can establish a learning plan using self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies at least three times a week in a mobile environment.
Learners can implement self-regulated learning (SRL) support strategies with an 80%+ application rate when designing mathematics lessons.
After completing the course, learners can evaluate and reflect on their own learning process in three or more stages using an SRL checklist.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
